channel.title: Sonic 3 - Big Arms [Remix, DnB, Hardcore]
channel.description:
Full Title: [Sonic The Hedgehog 3 & Knuckles - Big Arms (Final Boss) [Ekstrak Remix]](https://soundcloud.com/xtrk/bigarms-rmx)
![image|500x500](upload://gPP7wck9bFoFUyD92RWaexdwSy2.jpeg) [spoiler]All it needs is a Battle Royale in the title and that’s it. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)[/spoiler]
This song is for the Classic Videogames Challenge in the Auxy Collective Discord.
Not only is this is my first song that includes both DnB and Hardcore at the same time, it is also my first time mixing two projects into one!
Feedback and Constructive Criticism is allowed! Wallpaper made by SEGA. Mixed with Bandlab.
